original_text: At this time the boat with the disciples in it was in the middle of the lake. It was a long way from the land. The wind was blowing against the boat and the water was hitting it.
korean_text: 배가 이미 육지에서 수 리나 떠나서 바람이 거스르므로 물결로 말미암아 고난을 당하더라

sentences.original_text: At this time the boat with the disciples in it
was in the middle of the lake.
It was a long way from the land.
The wind was blowing against the boat
and the water was hitting it.
